name: GravTank
description:
This is my first attempt at a rail shooter following the GameDev.tv Unity 3D course. 

You control the spaceship with WASD keys and can fire the lasers with Left Mouse button. I have created 162 seconds of action with several enemies. There is much more to be done (shields, weapons upgrades, more levels, enemies that shoot back, story), let me know which feature to implement first.. ;) 

Credits for assets I used in this game: 

music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/extreme-action 

sky: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/skybox-series-free-103633 

Ships: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/space/star-sparrow-modular-spaceship-73167 https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/space/federation-corvette-f3-79860 https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/space/free-sf-fighter-11711
